name: ParticipationLegalAuthenticator
title: ParticipationLegalAuthenticator
description: A verifier who legally authenticates the accuracy of an act. An example would be a staff physician who sees a patient and dictates a note, then later signs it. Their signature constitutes a legal authentication.
